name: cpt-with-ross
description: CPT with Ross is an AI-assisted self-help web application tool for people who are participating in Cognitive Processing Therapy for PTSD.

scripts.lint:check: npm run lint:ruby:check && npm run lint:js:check
scripts.lint:ruby:check: bundle exec rubocop && bundle exec erb_lint --lint-all
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:ruby:fix && npm run lint:js:fix
scripts.lint:ruby:fix: bundle exec rubocop -A && bundle exec erb_lint --lint-all --autocorrect
